NAME: Chaitanya Gorrepati
ABOUT: Mr. Chaitanya Gorrepati is a Director and member of the Operating Committee ("OC") at D. E. Shaw India (“DESIS”) where he oversees the Finance, Legal and Admin, Board of Director's functions for the D. E. Shaw entities in India, including the Financial Operations team, which specializes in global delivery of analytics, financial reporting, tax, pricing, investor relations and regulatory compliance. Among his responsibilities as an OC member, Chaitanya helps chart the overall Firm's policy and strategic direction, while managing the execution of the firm's business plan on a day to day basis. He is widely recognized for his strengths in Finance, Operations, Strategic sourcing and Relationship management. Chaitanya has close to 20 years of experience in the industry and is a qualified Chartered Accountant.
